word_mean: 辅因子：必须和另一成分或要素共同作用才能行使功能的因子，如辅酶

sentence.Network_en: Magnesium is involved as a cofactor in many enzyme transfers.
sentence.Network_cn: 镁是许多酶转变的辅助因素.

sentence.Network_en: Many enzymes will not work without the presence of an additional nonprotein substance called a cofactor.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多酶如不外加一种叫做辅助因子的非蛋白质物质就不能工作.

sentence.Network_en: An enzyme without its cofactor is termed an apoenzyme.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有辅助因子的酶叫做脱辅酶.
